result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew D. Gorski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • OWI (2nd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Any vehicle titled or registered in defendant's name is subject to IID as is the defendant himself. To be installed immediately of today's date. 
Half Priced IID ordered

Case called:  1:23 pm
Includes 15CF374, 15CF621, 15CF622.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher:
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Pauline Toulouse;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
15CF374:
Moves to file an Amended Information. 
Moves to Amend Ct. 1 (Forgery-Uttering) to Ct. 1 (Misdemeanor Theft).
Ct. 2 (BJ)>>DRI.

15CF621:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI.

15CF622:
Moves to file an Amnded Information.
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI.
Moves to Amend Ct. 2 (OWI 2nd) to Ct. 2 (OWI 3rd).
Ct. 3 (Possession of THC)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
15CF374:
Ct. 1 (Misdemeanor Theft)>>NO CONTEST.

15CF621:
Ct. 2 (OWI 2nd)>>NO CONTEST.

15CF622:
Ct. 2 (OWI 3rd)>>NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CF374:
Ct. 1 (Misdemeanor Theft)>> Sentence W/H- 1 year probation, concurrent to probation in 15CF622. CONDITIONS: Counseling as recommended by agent, Good faith effort to Maintain Full time work/Full time school and when not fully engaged must complete 15 hours Community Service, No Contact with the Kwik Trip (Business 51), Restitution in the amount of $50 to be paid at the rate of $10/month until paid in full, Court Costs including DNA Sample and Surcharge. COURT signs Restitution Order.

15CF621:
Ct. 2 (OWI 2nd)>> $1615 fine inclusive of Court Costs, 45 days MCJ, Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 14 months, concurrent, as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed immediately of today's date; 1/2 priced IID installation fee to be paid; 14 months dl revocation; AODA  and AODA $165 Assessment fee. DNA Sample and Surcharge. COURT finds 47 days credit. 

15CF622:
Ct. 2 (OWI 3rd)>> SSTOP CASE. Sentence W/H- 18 months probation, concurrent to probation in 15CF374. CONDITIONS: $1694 fine inclusive of Court Costs, Impose 125 days MCJ, Stay 100, and Serve 25 pursuant to SSTOP. Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 27 months, concurrent, as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed immediately of today's date; 1/2 priced IID installation fee to be paid; 27 months dl revocation; AODA. DNA Sample and Surcharge. COURT finds 47 days credit. Defendant to use 25 days credit and the rest of credit be held in abeyance until/if needed.

Case Called: 9:16am. INCLUDE 15CF621, 15CF622. Clerk: Denise.  State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears in custody and by Atty Suzanne O'Neill for Atty Pauline Toulouse. Waiver of Prelim. filed in both files. Court questions deft as to waiver. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  Informations filed.  Readings Waived. Plea:  NOT GUILT on both files. Bond:  Continued. DATES: PTC 7/29/15 @ 2pm. C BR5. Adjourned: 9:21am.

Case Called: 11:05am. INCLUDES 15CF621, 15CF622. Clerk: Denise.  Defendant appears prose and in custody. Court questions Dft. RE: Employment/Income. Defendant states he is unsure if he will have a job when he is in custody. Court states he must meet with PD's office as he is in custody, does not have a job or employment at this time. CC: BR 5. Adjourned: 11:07am.

Includes 15CF621 and 15CF622.  Shall not consume alcohol.  Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.   No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents.  Absolute sobriety unless valid prescription for medications.
